```{r regression}

# experimenting with a regression between gap, further, and 

all_dat %>% 
  mutate(gap = gap * 1000) %>% 
  lm(gap ~ prez_edge + edge, data = .) %>% 
  summary()

all_dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(gap)) +
  geom_histogram()

all_dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, gap)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()

all_dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(edge, gap)) +
  geom_point()

```
